Content.Text:
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>. What a coincidence! You here
to do some shopping, too?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Me, I came by to buy some new seeds to plant.
<PAGE>
I was so excited to see what was in stock that I
guess I got here too early. Now I'm just waiting
for the shop to open.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So how're things going up on your farm,
<MYNAME>? Mine's doing okay.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Man, you're really workin' hard. I'm gonna have
to step up my game if I'm gonna keep up with
you!
<PAGE>
I mean, yeah, we might be sweethearts and all,
but even before that, we were rival farmers!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hey! I've been meaning to ask you this, but
what made you decide you wanted to be a
farmer?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hunh. It's been your dream since you were little?
Guess those fliers we sent out must've been the
little push over the edge for you, eh?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? Me?
<PAGE>
I couldn't really decide what I wanted to do.
There were so many things I wanted to try that I
just couldn't pick.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I was thinkin' really hard about it when I spotted
an informational poster about farming.
<PAGE>
Right then, it hit me that I could do all that
stuff...so I decided that's what I'd do!
Wow, that's kind of goofy.
So it was kind of a gut feeling?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey! It is NOT goofy!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>You decided to start farming after just seeing a
flier -- that's not much different!
<PAGE>
So I hadn't been dreaming about being a farmer
ever since I was a kid...
<PAGE>
And I did decide to start farming kind of on a
whim, so I can't DENY what you're saying...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But hearing you throw it in my face like that
really hurts.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
But no matter what you say, I think gut feelings
and hunches can be really important.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>And besides, how do you know if you're a good
fit with something if you don't give it a try first?
<PAGE>
Maybe it's easy for folks like you, who've had a
lifelong dream, to say what I did was simple...
<PAGE>
But to me, it was one of the most important
turning points in my life!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
No... It's okay.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Y'know, I don't really know which seeds I want
to buy, so I think I'll come back some other
time. Later, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>...

I was only joking around, but it looks like what I
said really hurt him.
<PAGE>
And he was really opening up about his past,
too. I didn't mean to be so harsh. I'll have to take
more care in what I say next time.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Yeah! Something that big, you've gotta look
inward to make your decision, right? That's what
I think!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Everyone else I'd talk to about it would always
say I was too rash for thinking I could start
farming on a whim.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But when you get a gut feeling like that, it's
important to listen to it! You never know how it'll
go until you try, right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>There are so many different things I wanted to
try, but I had such a hard time figuring out
where to start.
<PAGE>
If you just keep mulling over your options, you'll
keep growing older while missing out on some
good opportunities.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>So if there's somethin' you wanna do and you
can actually do it, I say go for it! That's pretty
important, don'tcha think?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I mean, that's how I got started farming here. 
<PAGE>
If I hadn't jumped in and gotten my hands dirty, I
would've never learned how hard -- and how
rewarding -- farming can be.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L><FACE_LOVE>And, uh...I wouldn't have met the townsfolk
here...or you, either.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>It might've just started out as a gut feeling...
<PAGE>
But I don't care what people say, 'cause I don't
regret coming here one bit!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>My gut feeling turned out to be the right choice
for me. I wish I could go back in time and tell
my younger self.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_EXCLAMATION_L>If you're gonna have dreams, make 'em huge,
just like I do. Someday, I'm gonna be the world's
greatest farmer! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L>And, uh...If we end up being husband and wife,
everything'll be perfe--

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
AHEM! N-nothing. I didn't say anything.
*whistles*

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Boy, when's that Otmar gonna open up? I wanna
get those seeds and get back to work!
